definition_en: A student-led body responsible for handling repeated category 1 infractions and first-offence category 2 infractions, promoting a culture of peer accountability.
definition_fr: Un organe dirigé par des étudiants, chargé de traiter les infractions répétées de catégorie 1 et les premières infractions de catégorie 2, promouvant une culture de responsabilité par les pairs.
definition_pt: Um órgão liderado por estudantes, responsável por lidar com infrações repetidas de categoria 1 e infrações de primeira ofensa de categoria 2, promovendo uma cultura de responsabilidade entre pares.
definition_sw: Baraza linaloongozwa na wanafunzi lenye jukumu la kushughulikia makosa ya mara kwa mara ya kategoria ya 1 na makosa ya kwanza ya kategoria ya 2, likikuza utamaduni wa uwajibikaji wa rika.

definition_en: The designated staff member responsible for student welfare and emergencies outside of regular school hours.
definition_fr: Le membre du personnel désigné responsable du bien-être des étudiants et des urgences en dehors des heures de classe régulières.
definition_pt: O membro da equipe designado, responsável pelo bem-estar dos alunos e por emergências fora do horário escolar regular.
definition_sw: Mwalimu aliyepewa jukumu la ustawi wa wanafunzi na dharura nje ya masaa ya kawaida ya shule.

definition_en: A system where all on-campus transactions are made using a student ID card or a pre-loaded account, eliminating the need for physical cash.
definition_fr: Un système où toutes les transactions sur le campus sont effectuées à l'aide d'une carte d'étudiant ou d'un compte préchargé, éliminant le besoin d'argent liquide.
definition_pt: Um sistema onde todas as transações no campus são feitas usando um cartão de identificação de estudante ou uma conta pré-carregada, eliminando a necessidade de dinheiro físico.
definition_sw: Mfumo ambapo miamala yote ya chuoni hufanywa kwa kutumia kadi ya kitambulisho cha mwanafunzi au akaunti iliyopakiwa awali, kuondoa hitaji la pesa taslimu.

definition_en: The official opening ceremony of the academic year at ALA, marking the formal welcome of new students into the community.
definition_fr: La cérémonie d'ouverture officielle de l'année académique à l'ALA, marquant l'accueil formel des nouveaux étudiants dans la communauté.
definition_pt: A cerimônia de abertura oficial do ano acadêmico na ALA, marcando a recepção formal de novos alunos na comunidade.
definition_sw: Sherehe rasmi ya ufunguzi wa mwaka wa masomo katika ALA, kuashiria kukaribishwa rasmi kwa wanafunzi wapya katika jamii.

definition_en: The annual Parent Weekend, where parents visit the campus to engage with faculty, staff, and their children's life at the academy.
definition_fr: Le week-end annuel des parents, où les parents visitent le campus pour échanger avec les professeurs, le personnel et découvrir la vie de leurs enfants à l'académie.
definition_pt: O Fim de Semana dos Pais anual, onde os pais visitam o campus para interagir com o corpo docente, funcionários e a vida de seus filhos na academia.
definition_sw: Mwisho wa Juma la Wazazi la kila mwaka, ambapo wazazi hutembelea chuo ili kushirikiana na walimu, wafanyakazi, na maisha ya watoto wao katika akademia.
